songs.title: 2 Heads

description.plain:
“It is said that 2 heads are better than one.” Coleman Hell, the singer-songwriter, argues that if the heads are not nodding in the same metaphorical direction, then they could be creating a monster.

A defining feature of this song is the blend of electronic and pop elements, along with the unmistakable banjo riff.

songs.embed_content: Read “2 Heads” by Coleman Hell on Genius

body.plain:
“It is said that 2 heads are better than one.” Coleman Hell, the singer-songwriter, argues that if the heads are not nodding in the same metaphorical direction, then they could be creating a monster.

A defining feature of this song is the blend of electronic and pop elements, along with the unmistakable banjo riff.

songs.lyrics:
16 Contributors2 Heads Lyrics[Chorus]
There must be something in the water
And there must be something about your daughter
She said our love ain’t nothing but a monster
Our love ain’t nothing but a monster with 2 heads

[Verse]
I turn to you, you’re all I see
Our love’s a monster with 2 heads and one heartbeat
I turn to you, you’re all I see
Our love’s a monster with 2 heads and one heartbeat
We just got caught up in the moment
Why don’t you call me in the morning instead?
Before we turn into a monster
Before we turn into a monster with 2 heads

[Pre-Chorus]
I hope to god I’ll love you harder
I hope to god I’ll love you longer
If only I could live forever
If only I could hold you longer

[Chorus]
There must be something in the water
And there must be something about your daughter
She said our love ain’t nothing but a monster
Our love ain’t nothing but a monster with 2 heads
You might also like[Verse]
I turn to you, you’re all I see
Our love’s a monster with 2 heads and one heartbeat
I turn to you, you’re all I see
Our love’s a monster with 2 heads and one heartbeat
We just got caught up in the moment
Why don’t you call me in the morning instead?
Before we turn into a monster
Before we turn into a monster with 2 heads

[Outro]
I hope to god I’ll love you harder
I hope to god I’ll love you longer
If only I could live forever
If only I could hold you longer
Well, I hope to god I’ll love you harder
I hope to god I’ll love you longer
If only I could live forever
If only I could hold you longer12Embed

songs.title: Fireproof
songs.embed_content: Read “Fireproof” by Coleman Hell on Genius
songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsFireproof Lyrics[Verse 1]
Did you know me and you
Must be fireproof with all the hell that we've been through
When all our lovin' lost its charm
Learned to make a shelter out in the storm (Hey)
Made it out of the cold
Climbed a mountain and I stepped on burning coals
When all our lovin' fell apart
Someone left the light on out in the dark

[Chorus]
You and I, we've both been through hell and high water
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof tonight
There's a spark catching fire, feel it getting hotter
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof
We'll be fireproof

[Verse 2]
Did you know you and me
Must be fireproof with all these flames between our sheets
When all our lovin' was almost gone
Made some in the moonlight, yeah, before the dawn (Hey)
Made it out of the heat
Crossed the desert and we sailed the seven seas
When all our lovin' felt so wrong
Found out all the hard times just made us strong
You might also like[Chorus]
You and I, we've both been through hell and high water
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof tonight
There's a spark catching fire, feel it getting hotter
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof
Fireproof
We'll be fireproof
Fireproof

[Outro Chorus]
You and I, we've both been through hell and high water
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof tonight
There's a spark catching fire, feel it getting hotter
I'll be yours, you'll be mine, we'll be fireproof3Embed

songs.title: Manic
songs.embed_content: Read “Manic” by Coleman Hell on Genius
songs.lyrics:
3 ContributorsManic Lyrics[Verse 1]
I can't get out of my bed, think there's magnets in my mattress
Might as well just be a casket for all I care
Oh no, here we go again
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in
When I feel crazy, I hide it, then fall apart in private
Where my mirror's the only one who sees my tears
There's a method to my sadness, it's a chemical imbalance
And my head is damaged way beyond repair

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I'm a manic depressive, passive aggressive, emotionally repressed
Introverted, extroverted, melancholic, alcoholic mess
I wish my inner thoughts were dinner conversation
I wished on every star and every constellation, mmm, yeah

[Chorus]
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)

[Verse 2]
Some days, I wish I was dead
Think I'm broken, I can't fix it
It's an intangible sickness, but it's there
Oh no, here we go again
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in
So I wrestle my demons 'til I go off the deep end
Where I'm drowning and I can't come up for air
I've tried every medication and I've gone in hibernation
Hiding in my room like a bipolar bear
You might also like[Pre-Chorus 2]
I'm obsessive, compulsive, and self-destructive
Hey, what did you expect?
Narcissistic and neurotic, I'm just one big ball of stress
I wish my inner thoughts were dinner conversation
I wished on every star and every constellation
I wish that I was calm and wasn't always anxious
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in

[Chorus]
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive) (Creeping in)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh (I'm a manic depressive)

[Outro]
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in, oh
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in, oh
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in, oh
Oh, manic, oh, manic, oh
The bad thoughts are creeping in
The bad thoughts are creeping in (I'm a manic depressive)Embed
